description: This file defines a Kotlin class 'RecipeAdapter' which is a RecyclerView adapter used to display a list of recipes in a UI. It manages view holders for recipe cards, binds recipe data to views, handles user interactions such as clicks and long presses, and updates the list efficiently using DiffUtil.

classes.name: RecipeAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for displaying recipe cards in lists, managing recipe data and user interactions.

classes.name: RecipeAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to views within a recipe card item.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder object for a recipe item view.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of recipe items.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds recipe data to the view holder and sets up click and long press event handlers.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set using DiffUtil to animate changes efficiently.
